ComicInfo.Title: Snake in the Grass Part 4
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake in the Grass Part 4: Claire reveals she was supposed to have been brainwashed by the Jugglers to kill Faoud but resisted them so she could take Faoud alive, but Anouk intervenes and kills Faoud. Bombstrike sets across Olliestan on a motorcycle with Leila. Storm Shadow's family agrees to give Dawn formal training; Zartan warns Cobra Commander of the threat Dawn poses to them. Wade returns to Springfield with his family, posing as a different 'Fred' series Crimson Guard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 19:22:25. [CVDB555345] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:38:16. [Issue ID 1641381]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),John Rauch,John Royale,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Faoud (dies),Ellen,Doctor Mindbender,Storm Shadow,Dawn Moreno,Leila,Duke,Anouk,Granny Demon [Obake Obaasan],Zartan,Gina,Saffron,Claire Hauser,G.I. Joe [Roadblock,Fred 57],Omar,Zarana,Cobra [Cobra Commander,Wade Collins [Fred 96],Baroness,Heather Collins,General Thurston Crowther,Bombstrike],Destro
